title: Drawing, "Girl Seated on a Step", August 20, 1879
signed: Singed with initials and dated in graphite, at lower right:  W. H. / Aug. 20th '79
creditline: Gift of Charles Savage Homer, Jr.
description: Horizontal view of a young woman seated on a step with her hands clasped over her knees and her head turned to the left, toward sketches.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Girl Seated on a Step", August 20, 1879.
August 20, 1879. Graphite on paper. Gift of Charles Savage Homer, Jr.. 1912-12-69.
